goal_reached_distance.description: The distance the navigator can be from the target for it to be considered reached.

agent_type.description: [string]The agent type to use for this navigatior. Agent types are specified in global.havok_ai_properties.

agent_radius_override.description: If greater than 0, the radius of the agent uses this value instead of the unit size. Can be used to prevent large units from failing to pathfind.
